name: Space Factory (MindGamesStudios)
description:
Available to buy NOW on itch.io!

Space Factory is an  factory builder simulation game  about building and creating automated factories to produce items. Use your imagination to desing you own factory and escape from the planet .

SpaceFactory is developed and published by MindGamesStudios. You cannot resell or share the game files

(MindGames)

We upload the game in itch.io so we can fix all the bugs before we upload to gog.com and steam

 Feel free to leave a review  LINKS Discord Instagram SpaceFactory System Requirements Windows Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphic 4000 or similar 
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • 64-bitProcessor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 or GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
 Mac OS(Intel 64 bit and Apple silicon) Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: UHD Graphics 630 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or M2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M2 Graphics or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
